channel.title: Ummm cant get Hd client up
channel.description:
well i changed my class path and now im getting this error when trying to open my client [code]'java' is not recognized as an internal or external command, operable program or batch file. Press any key to continue . . .[/code]
and before that it would work BUT it would say "Connecting to update server" and nothing would happen. it would just freeze.
and ideas / help?

item.title: Ummm cant get Hd client up
item.dc:creator: @badger41 badger41
item.description:
@badger41 wrote:

jaloko:

Yes sir, is sure does. that dident happpen before but it is now. any fixes? because i dont use 500+ clients but i wanna try it.

that means it cant connect to your server, has nothing to do with your java.

make sure youve port forwarded correctly, and set the client to port 0.0.0.0 if your using it for personal use

Read full topic
item.source: Ummm cant get Hd client up

item.title: Ummm cant get Hd client up
item.dc:creator: @badger41 badger41
item.description:
@badger41 wrote:

jaloko:

no the thing is i had the server up and running. and went into the runclient and it just sat there not doing anything sooo yah…i do need a cache?

did the run.bat say error_js5connect or something along those lines?

Read full topic

item.title: Ummm cant get Hd client up
item.dc:creator: @badger41 badger41
item.description:
@badger41 wrote:

the ‘connecting to update server’ had nothing to do with your java, is was because the client couldnt connect to the server so it just sat there.

Read full topic
